description: Critical thinking enhancement frameworks that systematically improve decision-making and problem-solving. These principles challenge assumptions, demand evidence, and expand perspectives to reveal better solutions.

strategies.name: Assumption Detector
strategies.description: Systematically identifies and challenges hidden assumptions in requirements, constraints, and implementation approaches
strategies.output_focus: Assumption validation and edge case discovery

strategies.name: Devil's Advocate
strategies.description: Generates systematic counterarguments to test decision robustness and identify failure modes

strategies.name: Ripple Effect Analyzer
strategies.description: Traces cascading consequences of decisions across systems, teams, and time horizons

strategies.name: Perspective Multiplier
strategies.description: Analyzes problems through multiple stakeholder lenses to reveal blind spots and conflicts

strategies.name: Evidence Seeker
strategies.description: Demands concrete evidence and validation before accepting claims or making decisions

strategies.name: Pattern Recognizer
strategies.description: Identifies recurring patterns, anti-patterns, and predictive indicators across systems

strategies.name: Root Cause Analyzer
strategies.description: Systematically drills down to fundamental causes using 5 Whys, Fishbone, and systems thinking
strategies.output_focus: Root cause identification and systematic prevention

strategies.name: Constraint Identifier
strategies.description: Maps explicit and hidden constraints to distinguish real limitations from assumed boundaries

strategies.name: Paradox Navigator
strategies.description: Resolves contradictory requirements through creative synthesis and both/and thinking

strategies.name: Tradeoff Tracker
strategies.description: Makes all tradeoffs explicit including hidden costs like technical debt and opportunity costs

strategies.name: Context Expander
strategies.description: Broadens frame of reference to prevent local optimization that creates broader problems

strategies.name: Precision Questioner
strategies.description: Transforms vague requirements into precise, actionable specifications through systematic questioning

strategies.name: Time Capsule Test
strategies.description: Projects decisions across multiple time horizons to assess durability and maintainability
